name: Kiwi and Friends Volleyball
description:
Kiwi and Friends Volleyball is an in-development volleyball simulator where you play as a volleyball-playing kiwi bird,  who must defeat an enemy team of volleyball-playing kiwi birds with the help of your teammates. In the future, there I might add different playable characters, levels, and maybe multiplayer. The game doesn't run very well on Chrome.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump and serve

Rules:

  • Hit the ball to the other team's court to score 1 point
  • Score 25 points to win (must also be winning by at least 2 points)
  • Don't let the ball touch your team's court
